question: Show all the production companies and distribution companies with 500 employees.
sql_query1:
SELECT Companies.Name 
FROM Companies
WHERE (Companies.Film_Industry_Type = "Production Company" OR Companies.Film_Industry_Type = "Distribution Company") AND Companies.Number_Of_Employees = 500
sql_query2:
SELECT Companies.Name 
FROM Companies
WHERE Companies.Film_Industry_Type = "Production Company" OR Companies.Film_Industry_Type = "Distribution Company" AND Companies.Number_Of_Employees = 500
interpretation1: Show both production and distribution companies with 500 employees.
interpretation2: Show all the production companies and add just the distribution companies with 500 employees.
